Literature.Title: A novel cysteine-rich antifungal peptide ToAMP4 from Taraxacum officinale Wigg. flowers.
Literature.Author: Astafieva AA, Rogozhin EA, Andreev YA, Odintsova TI, Kozlov SA, Grishin EV, Egorov TA

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Alternaria alternata(IC50=2.9µM),Alternaria alternata(MIC=1.0µM),Aspergillus niger VKM F-33(IC50=4.2µM),Aspergillus niger VKM F-33(MIC=2.8µM),Bipolaris sorokiniana(IC50=>15.0µM),Bipolaris sorokiniana(MIC=>15.0µM),Colletotrichum gloeosporioides VKM F-700(IC50=>15.0µM),Colletotrichum gloeosporioides VKM F-700(MIC=>15.0µM),Fusarium avenaceum VKM-F132(IC50=13.1µM),Fusarium avenaceum VKM-F132(MIC=6.7µM),Neocamarosporium betae VKM F-2532(IC50=10.7µM),Neocamarosporium betae VKM F-2532(MIC=8.0µM),Verticillium albo-atrum VKM F-2437(IC50=>15.0µM),Verticillium albo-atrum VKM F-2437(MIC=>15.0µM),Pseudomonas syringae VKM B-1546(no activity data),Bacillus subtilis VKM B-501(no activity data),Escherichia coli DH5alpha(no activity data),Clavibacter michiganensis subsp. michiganensis VKM Ac-1144(no activity data)
